description: Please refer to the English attachment. See attachment for full contract details.
duration_in_months: a series of addendums to the original agreement subjected to future amendments from the Director
full_summary:
_____________________

### Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest

#### File Number: 27784

The following is a **Request for Information** for the provision of **Long-Term Accommodation Services** in **Toronto, Ontario**.

#### Procurement Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** December 21, 2023, at 17:00:00 ET
* **Publication Date:** December 7, 2023
* **Contracting Entity:** Public Services and Procurement Canada

#### Procurement Method

This procurement will be conducted through a **Competitive - Open Bidding** process.

#### Services Required

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing **Long-Term Accommodation Services** in **Toronto, Ontario**.

#### Notice Details

* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Toronto, Ontario (except NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR), Toronto
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** TBA
* **Expected Contract End Date:** TBA

#### Point of Contact

For further information, please contact:

Grant Miller
grant.miller@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
(416) 738-2419
(416) 952-6481 (fax)
4900 Yonge St., 10th floor, Toronto, Ontario, Canada, M2N 6A6

Please refer to the attached **English** document for more information.

 Documents can be accessed at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/26614/27784-eoi-toronto-canadabuys-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/26614/27784-eoi-toronto-canadabuys-en.pdf) [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/26614/27784-eoi-toronto-achatscanada-fr%\)(1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/26614/27784-eoi-toronto-achatscanada-fr%\(1.pdf)

Let me evaluate based on the questions you have asked and provide feedback.
